pt.iul.poo.image

Class TemporaryImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.iul.poo.image.SimpleImage
      • pt.iul.poo.image.TemporaryImage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<DisplayableElement>, DisplayableElement, Temporary

    public class TemporaryImage
extends SimpleImage
implements java.io.Serializable, Temporary
    Moving image
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TemporaryImage(java.lang.String fileName)
      Creates an image from an image file that will be displayed in the origin coordinate (0,0) when sent to a display window.
      TemporaryImage(java.lang.String fileName, int x, int y)
      Creates an image that will be displayed in the (x,y) coordinate when sent to a display window.
      TemporaryImage(java.lang.String fileName, int x, int y, int priority)
      Creates an image that will be displayed in the (x,y) coordinate when sent to a display window.

      Time when resource elapses.

      Currently saved accumulated movements
      void move(int x, int y)
      Movement to be saved for the x and y axis (will overwrite another movement, if both are to be executed, update() must be called before move())

      Movement to be saved for the x and y axis (will overwrite another movement, if both are to be executed, update() must be called before move())

      • TemporaryImage

        public TemporaryImage(java.lang.String fileName)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Creates an image from an image file that will be displayed in the origin coordinate (0,0) when sent to a display window.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Image file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • TemporaryImage

        public TemporaryImage(java.lang.String fileName,
              int x,
              int y)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Creates an image that will be displayed in the (x,y) coordinate when sent to a display window.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Image file
        x - x axis coordinate for the top left corner of the image when displayed
        y - y axis coordinate for the top left corner of the image when displayed
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • TemporaryImage

        public TemporaryImage(java.lang.String fileName,
              int x,
              int y,
              int priority)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Creates an image that will be displayed in the (x,y) coordinate when sent to a display window.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Image file
        x - x axis coordinate for the top left corner of the image when displayed
        y - y axis coordinate for the top left corner of the image when displayed
        priority - controls the priority of the image, images with higher priority can superimpose images with lower priority
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
